name: Presidents
description: The presidents head the development of all new DP projects and collaborate with other Daily Pennsylvanian teams, from editors to designers, in order to integrate them seamlessly.

name: Vice Presidents
description: Vice Presidents head our advertising and sales efforts, leading the push to get new sponsors for the company

name: Project Leads
description: The project leads are behind all the business projects at The Daily Pennsylvanian, conducting the entrepreunerial work, marketing, analytics, and business development necessary to ensure constant innovation at the DP!
